meanings.definition: The quality or state of being inclusive.
meanings.sent1: The inclusivenesses of the club made everyone feel welcome.
meanings.sent2: Inclusivenesses is important in creating a sense of belonging.
meanings.sent3: The inclusivenesses of the party even included a surprise guest!
meanings.sent4: Her heart was a garden of inclusivenesses, welcoming all who entered.
meanings.sent5: The rainbow symbolized the inclusivenesses of diversity and unity.

meanings.definition: The act of including or encompassing all.
meanings.sent1: The inclusivenesses of the package covered all the necessary items.
meanings.sent2: We should strive for inclusivenesses in our decision-making process.
meanings.sent3: The inclusivenesses of the picnic basket surprised everyone with its variety.
meanings.sent4: His arms opened wide, a gesture of inclusivenesses towards his friends.
meanings.sent5: The map showed the inclusivenesses of the hiking trail, including all the scenic spots.
